about_the_game:
A collection of songs made for the original William and Sly Flash games, by series creator Lucas Paakh.
These ambient, nature-themed tracks are a well loved and fondly remembered part of the series. Now they can also be enjoyed on their own, for a tranquil, meditative listening experience.

With the Classic Collection being made available for Free, this OST will serve as a tip jar to directly support Lucas and his creative works.
